about_the_game:
A Hero’s Journey and the Quest for Love

Navigate the corporate world while building connections with five uniquely enchanting goddess-like colleagues.

Use your magical abilities to help them overcome challenges and find true love.

Each decision shapes your path and could lead to the tender embrace of a goddess.

Tender-hearted CEO Noah (Saika Kawakita): Your dream crush is now your boss! Noah’s shy allure and flirtatious charm turn every interaction into a chance to win her heart.

Mysterious Tycoon Karin (Ai Uehara): Seductive and wealthy, Karen’s magnetic presence forces you to choose between her captivating allure and your intriguing colleagues.

Cute Colleague Emma (Yui Mihama): Sweet and cute on the surface, Emma’s profound inner world challenges you to resist her irresistible depth.

Energetic Colleague Kaede (Kira): With a strong and sunny demeanor, Christine’s hidden vulnerabilities will touch your heart and spark your protective instincts.

Playful Heiress Junna (Joey): Quirky and whimsical, Gianna’s spontaneous surprises will keep you on your toes and make every encounter an exhilarating adventure.

Highlights

Fulfilling Your Fantasies

Each goddess is capturable with unique storylines, enchanting cosplay outfits, and 1-on-1 romantic scenes. Discover custom stories filled with delightful surprises.

A Star-Studded Cast

Experience Saika Kawakita’s debut in live-action romance simulation, alongside Ai Uehara’s captivating retirement work. New stars Yui Mihama, Joey, and Kira from Japan, Malaysia, and Taiwan add to the allure.

Isekai Magic Skills

Harness magical elements to enhance your romance and solve challenges with the goddesses.

Infinite Romance and Multiple Endings

Explore various endings shaped by your choices. Who will you end up with?

Romantic Japanese Filming

Enjoy immersive scenes with Saika Kawakita in school uniform, cherry blossom (Sakura) walks, and hot springs, capturing the essence of Japanese romance.

About Us - The Real Fourth Wall

At Fourth Wall, we turn dreams into reality. We bring together the top stars—No.1 actress Saika Kawakita and queen Ai Uehara—for a zero-distance romance experience. Get ready for a truly unforgettable journey where fantasy and love collide. Stay tuned!
detailed_description:
Ever dreamed of a sweet romance with a goddess?

About 'Back from the Other World, I Missed Love.'

Imagine defeating the Demon King in another world and returning to find your greatest adventure awaits in a mundane office. In ""Back from the Other World, I Missed Love,"" you’re a rookie hero with magical powers working under the goddess you’ve always admired.


About the Game

A Hero’s Journey and the Quest for Love

Navigate the corporate world while building connections with five uniquely enchanting goddess-like colleagues.

name: Back from the other world, I missed love.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 獨立顯卡
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Defeat the Demon King and find your next adventure in an office with goddess-like colleagues. You, as a rookie hero with magical powers, connect with captivating stars like Saika Kawakita, Ai Uehara, and Yui Mihama.
supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, English, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
